<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å‰è¨€</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ä»Šå¤©å¤§å§šç»™å¤§å®¶åˆ†äº«ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Ant Design è®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€å®ç°ã€æ¼‚äº®çš„ .NET Avalonia UI æ§ä»¶åº“ï¼šAtomUIã€‚</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>AtomUIé¡¹ç›®ä»‹ç»</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>AtomUI æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Ant Design è®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€å®ç°ã€æ¼‚äº®çš„ .NET Avalonia UI æ§ä»¶åº“ï¼Œè‡´åŠ›äºå°† Ant Design ä¼˜ç§€è€Œé«˜æ•ˆçš„è®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€å’Œä½“éªŒå¸¦å…¥ Avalonia/.NET è·¨å¹³å°æ¡Œé¢è½¯ä»¶å¼€å‘é¢†åŸŸã€‚</span></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>Avaloniaä»‹ç»</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>Avaloniaæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¼ºå¤§çš„æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä½¿å¼€å‘äººå‘˜èƒ½å¤Ÿä½¿ç”¨.NETåˆ›å»ºè·¨å¹³å°åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºã€‚å®ƒä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„æ¸²æŸ“å¼•æ“ç»˜åˆ¶UIæ§ä»¶ï¼Œç¡®ä¿åœ¨Windowsã€macOSã€Linuxã€Androidã€iOSå’ŒWebAssemblyç­‰ä¸åŒå¹³å°ä¸Šå…·æœ‰ä¸€è‡´çš„å¤–è§‚å’Œè¡Œä¸ºã€‚è¿™æ„å‘³ç€å¼€å‘äººå‘˜å¯ä»¥å…±äº«ä»–ä»¬çš„UIä»£ç ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ä¸åŒçš„ç›®æ ‡å¹³å°ä¸Šä¿æŒç»Ÿä¸€çš„å¤–è§‚å’Œæ„Ÿè§‰ã€‚</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å¿«é€Ÿä½¿ç”¨ AtomUI åº“</span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ç±»åº“å®‰è£…</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>dotnet add package AtomUI --version 1.0.0-alpha<br></span></code></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é…ç½®é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&lt;Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk"&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PropertyGroup&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;OutputType&gt;WinExe&lt;/OutputType&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;TargetFramework&gt;net9.0&lt;/TargetFramework&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;Nullable&gt;enable&lt;/Nullable&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;BuiltInComInteropSupport&gt;true&lt;/BuiltInComInteropSupport&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ApplicationManifest&gt;app.manifest&lt;/ApplicationManifest&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;AvaloniaUseCompiledBindingsByDefault&gt;true&lt;/AvaloniaUseCompiledBindingsByDefault&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/PropertyGroup&gt;<br><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;ItemGroup&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="AtomUI" Version="0.0.6-build.4"/&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="Avalonia.Desktop" Version="11.3.2"/&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PackageReference Include="Avalonia.Diagnostics" Version="11.3.2"&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;IncludeAssets Condition="'$(Configuration)' != 'Debug'"&gt;None&lt;/IncludeAssets&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;PrivateAssets Condition="'$(Configuration)' != 'Debug'"&gt;All&lt;/PrivateAssets&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/PackageReference&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &lt;/ItemGroup&gt;<br><span>&lt;/Project&gt;<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é…ç½®ç¨‹åºå…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶</span></h3>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31RXsW10tmKiazAANib1HnbqcEWkOUAOFMxrlnFXyMyKq5bmlHG0klKN6mLaiazQ0O86PdmRuQuvnD60/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code>using<span>&nbsp;Avalonia;<br>using<span>&nbsp;System;<br>namespace<span>&nbsp;AtomUIProgressApp<span>;<br>class<span>&nbsp;Program<br><span>{<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; [STAThread<span>]<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>public<span>&nbsp;<span>static<span>&nbsp;<span>void<span>&nbsp;<span>Main<span>(<span>string<span>[] args<span>)<span>&nbsp;=&gt; BuildAvaloniaApp()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .StartWithClassicDesktopLifetime(args);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<span>public<span>&nbsp;<span>static<span>&nbsp;AppBuilder&nbsp;<span>BuildAvaloniaApp<span>(<span>)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;var<span>&nbsp;builder = AppBuilder.Configure&lt;App&gt;()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .UsePlatformDetect()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .WithInterFont()<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .With(new<span>&nbsp;Win32PlatformOptions())<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .LogToTrace();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;var<span>&nbsp;themeBuilder = builder.CreateThemeManagerBuilder();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseCultureInfo(new<span>&nbsp;CultureInfo(LanguageCode.en_US));<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseTheme(ThemeManager.DEFAULT_THEME_ID);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; themeBuilder.UseOSSControls();<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;return<span>&nbsp;builder.UseAtomUI(themeBuilder);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>}<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>é¡¹ç›®æºç åœ°å€</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æ›´å¤šé¡¹ç›®å®ç”¨åŠŸèƒ½å’Œç‰¹æ€§æ¬¢è¿å‰å¾€é¡¹ç›®å¼€æºåœ°å€æŸ¥çœ‹ğŸ‘€ï¼Œåˆ«å¿˜äº†ç»™é¡¹ç›®ä¸€ä¸ªStaræ”¯æŒğŸ’–ã€‚</span></p>

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å·²æ”¶å½•åˆ°C#/.NET/.NET Coreä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰ä¸­ï¼Œå…³æ³¨ä¼˜ç§€é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ç²¾é€‰èƒ½è®©ä½ åŠæ—¶äº†è§£C#ã€.NETå’Œ.NET Coreé¢†åŸŸçš„æœ€æ–°åŠ¨æ€å’Œæœ€ä½³å®è·µï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡å’Œè´¨é‡ã€‚å‘å·²æŒ–ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿å¤§å®¶è¸Šè·ƒæäº¤PRæ¨èæˆ–è‡ªèï¼ˆ<strong>è®©ä¼˜ç§€çš„é¡¹ç›®å’Œæ¡†æ¶ä¸è¢«åŸ‹æ²¡ğŸ¤</strong><span>ï¼‰ã€‚</span></span></p>

<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">ä½œè€…ç®€ä»‹ï¼š</span>ä¸€ä¸ªçƒ­çˆ±ç¼–ç¨‹ã€å–„äºåˆ†äº«ã€å–œæ¬¢å­¦ä¹ ã€æ¢ç´¢ã€å°è¯•æ–°äº‹ç‰©å’Œæ–°æŠ€æœ¯çš„å…¨æ ˆè½¯ä»¶å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆã€‚</p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;">
æœ¬æ–‡ç‰ˆæƒå½’ä½œè€…å’Œåšå®¢å›­å…±æœ‰ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è½¬è½½ï¼Œä½†æœªç»ä½œè€…åŒæ„å¿…é¡»ä¿ç•™æ­¤æ®µå£°æ˜ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢æ˜æ˜¾ä½ç½®ç»™å‡ºåŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¿ç•™è¿½ç©¶æ³•å¾‹è´£ä»»çš„æƒåˆ©ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹ä¸€ä¸‹å³ä¸‹è§’çš„<a onclick="votePost(cb_entryId,'Digg')" href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red;">ã€â™¥æ¨èâ™¥ã€‘</a>ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›èƒ½å¤ŸæŒç»­çš„ä¸ºå¤§å®¶å¸¦æ¥å¥½çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨æè¿°ä¸æ­£ç¡®çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æŒ‡æ­£æˆ–è¡¥å……ï¼Œä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ã€‚
